ehotel.inter
Interface EVSVod

public interface EVSVod

AMDVod interface supply functions to manipulate database in EVS module side. (inserting and removing data in database(such as movie,trailer,subtitle).

Since:
SDK1.6
Version:
ehotel2.0
Author:
hoavk@elcom.com.vn

Method Detail

addVod

int addVod(int subjectId,
           int storageId,
           java.lang.String url,
           Vod movieInfo)
addVod

The method which allows to add a movie into system

Parameters:
subjectId - A sequence identifies subject which movie is added.
url - An absolute URL giving the base location of the movie.Should not be null.
movieInfo - The object contain entire movie information (such as title,actor,direction,plot,poster). Should not be null. (see Vod)
Returns:
int : return sequence value which save in database.if the movie is completely added.-1 otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
Vod

setUrl

               java.lang.String url)
set an absolute URL giving the base location of the movie

Parameters:
vodId - A sequence identifies movie
url -
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the movie is completely added.-1 otherwise.

addTrailer

int addTrailer(int vodId,
               Trailer trailerInfo)

The method which allows to add a movie's trailer into system

Parameters:
vodId - A sequence of the desired movie which trailer is added.
trailerInfo - the object contain entire trailer information (such as title,url..). Should not be null.(see Trailer)
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the trailer is completely added.-1 otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException
See Also:
Trailer

addSubtitle

int addSubtitle(int vodId,
                java.util.Vector<SubTitle> subTitleInfo)

The method which allows to add a movie's subtitle into system

Parameters:
vodId - A sequence of the desired movie which subtitle is added.
subTitleInfo - the object contain entire subtile information (such as title,url,language..). Should not be null.
Returns:
return sequence value which save in database.if the subtile is completely added.-1 otherwise.

removeVod

The method which allows to remove a movie out system

Parameters:
vodId - A sequence of the desired movie to remove
Returns:
true if the value is completely removed. false otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - java.sql.SQLException
